methods.title: License
methods.description:
To render an HTML license, use 
`{% include '@core/license.twig' with {'license': podcast.license} %}`

methods.title: List of podcast contributors.
List of service profiles
methods.description: Parameters: - **type:** (optional) "social", "donation" or "all". Default: "all" Example: ```html {% for service in podcast.services({type: "social"}) %} {% endfor %} ```
